features: Upper: Classic design with a wide forefoot strap for effortless style. Full grain leather & full grain leather and suede combination uppers with synthetic lining. Mixed metallic upper(pure silver & warm gold)on style. Medial gore insert
Footbed: Clean, modern PU-like EVA foam footbed construction with 3D heel cushion for premium comfort visual. Synthetic topcover
Outsole: Rubber cupsole construction with Sorel’s iconic scallops & razor design for enhanced traction & durability in key wear areas
